name: UpdateIssueState
description:
Update the state of an issue in Datadog.

This tool updates the state of an issue identified by `issue_id` in Datadog, allowing transitions between states such as `OPEN`, `RESOLVED`, or `IGNORED`. It should be called when you need to change an issue's status.

parameters.name: issue_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the issue to update its state in Datadog.

parameters.name: issue_state
parameters.description: State of the issue, valid values are 'OPEN', 'ACKNOWLEDGED', 'RESOLVED', 'IGNORED', 'EXCLUDED'.

parameters.name: issue_id_value
parameters.description: The identifier for the issue to update the state of in Datadog.

parameters.name: issue_object_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the object. Accepted value is 'error_tracking_issue'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
